mozilla.components.service.fxa

Class FxaResult<T>

  • mozilla.components.service.fxa.FxaResult<T>

  • public class FxaResult<T>

    FxaResult is a class that represents an asynchronous result.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FxaResult.Companion

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FxaResult.Companion Companion 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FxaResult()
      FxaResult is a class that represents an asynchronous result.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void complete(T value)
      This completes the result with the specified value. IllegalStateException is thrown if the result is already complete.
      void completeExceptionally(java.lang.Exception exception)
      This completes the result with the specified Exception. IllegalStateException is thrown if the result is already complete.
      <U> FxaResult<U> then(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,mozilla.components.service.fxa.FxaResult> fn)
      Adds a value listener to be called when the class FxaResult is completed with a value. Listeners will be invoked on the same thread in which the class FxaResult was completed.
      <U> FxaResult<U> then(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,mozilla.components.service.fxa.FxaResult> vfn, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Exception,mozilla.components.service.fxa.FxaResult> efn)
      Adds listeners to be called when the class FxaResult is completed either with a value or Exception. Listeners will be invoked on the same thread in which the class FxaResult was completed.
      <U> FxaResult<U> then(FxaResult.OnValueListener<T,U> valueListener, FxaResult.OnExceptionListener<U> exceptionListener)
      Adds listeners to be called when the class FxaResult is completed either with a value or Exception. Listeners will be invoked on the same thread in which the class FxaResult was completed.
      void whenComplete(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,kotlin.Unit> fn)
      Adds a value listener to be called when the class FxaResult and the whole chain of FxaResult.then calls is completed with a value. Listeners will be invoked on the same thread in which the class FxaResult was completed.

      • then

        public <U> FxaResult<U> then(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,mozilla.components.service.fxa.FxaResult> fn)

        Adds a value listener to be called when the class FxaResult is completed with a value. Listeners will be invoked on the same thread in which the class FxaResult was completed.

        Parameters:
        fn - A lambda expression with the same method signature as interface FxaResult.OnValueListener, called when the class FxaResult is completed with a value.
        See Also:
        class FxaResult, class FxaResult

      • then

        public <U> FxaResult<U> then(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,mozilla.components.service.fxa.FxaResult> vfn,
                             kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Exception,mozilla.components.service.fxa.FxaResult> efn)

        Adds listeners to be called when the class FxaResult is completed either with a value or Exception. Listeners will be invoked on the same thread in which the class FxaResult was completed.

        Parameters:
        vfn - A lambda expression with the same method signature as interface FxaResult.OnValueListener, called when the class FxaResult is completed with a value.
        efn - A lambda expression with the same method signature as interface FxaResult.OnExceptionListener, called when the class FxaResult is completed with an exception.
        See Also:
        class FxaResult, Exception, class FxaResult

      • then

        public <U> FxaResult<U> then(FxaResult.OnValueListener<T,U> valueListener,
                             FxaResult.OnExceptionListener<U> exceptionListener)

        Adds listeners to be called when the class FxaResult is completed either with a value or Exception. Listeners will be invoked on the same thread in which the class FxaResult was completed.

        Parameters:
        valueListener - An instance of interface FxaResult.OnValueListener, called when the class FxaResult is completed with a value.
        exceptionListener - An instance of interface FxaResult.OnExceptionListener, called when the class FxaResult is completed with an Exception.
        See Also:
        class FxaResult, Exception, class FxaResult

      • whenComplete

        public void whenComplete(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,kotlin.Unit> fn)

        Adds a value listener to be called when the class FxaResult and the whole chain of FxaResult.then calls is completed with a value. Listeners will be invoked on the same thread in which the class FxaResult was completed.

        Parameters:
        fn - A lambda expression with the same method signature as interface FxaResult.OnValueListener, called when the class FxaResult is completed with a value.
        See Also:
        class FxaResult, FxaResult.then, class FxaResult

      • complete

        public void complete(T value)

        This completes the result with the specified value. IllegalStateException is thrown if the result is already complete.

        Parameters:
        value - The value used to complete the result.
        Throws:

      • completeExceptionally

        public void completeExceptionally(java.lang.Exception exception)

        This completes the result with the specified Exception. IllegalStateException is thrown if the result is already complete.

        Parameters:
        exception - The Exception used to complete the result.
        Throws:
        See Also:
        Exception
